patterns: college ke bare mai kuch bataaye
don bosco ke bare mai batayein
responses: don bosko insteetyoot oph teknolojee kurla pashchim, mumbee vishvavidyaalay se sambaddh ek nijee injeeniyaring kolej hai. ise dhaarmik alpasankhyak ka darja diya gaya hai roman kaitholik. sansthaan ko NAAC dvaara 2019 mein b ++ gred se sammaanit kiya gaya tha. parisar mein poore varsh hariyaalee rahatee hai. baahar ke kamaron ko poted plaants lagaakar ugaaya jaata hai. haal ke badalaav ooparee paristhiyon mein lon ke alaava, khel ke maidaan aur svaagat sthal ke roop mein dogune ho gae hai.

patterns: kya aap meree madad kar sakte hai
responses: main achchha hoon, main aapakee kaise madad kar sakta hoon
haay main theek hoon, main kaise madad kar sakta hoon
main aapakee sahaayata kaise kar sakata hoon
main tumhaaree kisee cheez mein madad kar sakata hoon kya

patterns: college mein bahare khel kya hai
responses: don bosko mein ek phutabol maidaan, volee bol kort aur ek baasketabol kort hai

patterns: kya main kuch khel sakta hoon
responses: don bosko mein kairam, shatranj aur table tenis jaise indoor khelon ke praavadhaan hai.

patterns: college mein saanskrtik kaaryakram kya hai
college mein cultural kaaryakram kya hai
college mein saanskrtik activities kya hai
responses: don bosko mein mukhy roop se do saanskrtik kaaryakram hai. college dvaara aayojit intra-kolej takaneekee utsav ko kolosiyam kaha jaata hai. kolej ne 2016 se histeeriya shuroo kiya hai, jo dbchl ke tahat aane vaale sabhee sansthaanon ke liye saanskrtik aur khel mega utsav hai. kolej bhee ek intar-kolejiet onalain utsav teknaik aur gem oph kod ka aayojan karata hai, jo esosieshan dvaara kampyooting dvaara sanchaalit hai. masheenaree aur kampyootar sosaitee oph indiya ke chhaatr don bosko mein adhyaayon.

patterns: IT branch ka kota kitna hai
Information Technology ka kota kitna hai
computer science ka kota kitna hai
responses: mumbai vishvavidyaalay ke tahat kolej, nimnalikhit kaaryakramon mein injeeniyaring mein snaatak kee digree, maikenikal injeeniyaring mein ek sau bess seeten, ilektroniks aur doorasanchaar injeeniyaring mein 60 seeten, kampyootar injeeniyaring, soochana praudyogikee pratyek pradaan karata hai. dhaarmik alpasankhyak kote se, sabhee seeton mein se 51 pratishat roman kaitholik ke lie aarakshit hai.
